mapper.update:
update l_manual_order
category=#{category},
carrier_no=#{carrierNo},
china_carrier=#{chinaCarrier},
track_no=#{trackNo},
channel=#{channel},
update_on=#{updateOn},
update_by=#{updator},
from_address_line1=#{fromAddressLine1},
from_address_line2=#{fromAddressLine2},
from_address_line2=#{fromAddressLine2},
from_zipcode=#{fromZipCode},
to_address_line1=#{toAddressLine1},
to_address_line2=#{toAddressLine2},
to_address_line2=#{toAddressLine3},
to_zipcode=#{toZipCode},
on_behalf=#{collect},
amount=#{amount},
china_no=#{chinaNo},
from_whom=#{fromName},
to_whom=#{toName},
from_contact=#{fromContact},
to_contact=#{toContact},
collect_num=#{collectNum},
length=#{length},
width=#{width},
height=#{height},
sum=#{sum},
total_volume_with_weight=#{totalVolumeWithWeight},
total_weight=#{totalWeight},
total_volume=#{totalVolume},
status=#{status},
files=#{files},
pickup=#{pickup},
where ord_no=#{orderNo}
mapper.insert: insert into l_manual_order(ord_no, user_custom_order_no, category, carrier_no, track_no, owner, status, update_on, create_on, create_by, update_by, from_address_line1, from_address_line2, from_address_line3, from_zipcode, to_address_line1, to_address_line2, to_address_line3, to_zipcode, on_behalf, amount, china_no, from_contact, to_contact, from_whom, to_whom, channel, china_carrier, collect_num) values (#{orderNo}, #{userCustomOrderNo}, #{category}, #{orderNo}, #{trackNo}, #{creator}, #{status}, #{updateOn}, #{createOn}, #{creator}, #{updator}, #{fromAddressLine1}, #{fromAddressLine2}, #{fromAddressLine3}, #{fromZipCode}, #{toAddressLine1}, #{toAddressLine2}, #{toAddressLine3}, #{toZipCode}, #{collect}, #{orderNo}, #{chinaNo}, #{fromContact}, #{toContact}, #{fromName}, #{toName}, #{channel}, #{chinaCarrier}, #{collectNum})

insert into l_manual_order_content(ordno, sku, name, num, price,picked,satisfied,uuid,dy_sku) values
(#{item.ordno}, #{item.sku}, #{item.name}, #{item.num}, #{item.price},#{item.picked},#{item.satisfied},#{item.uuid},#{item.dySku})
mapper.select: select ord_no as orderNo, user_custom_order_no as userCustomOrderNo, status, create_by as creator, create_on as createOn, carrier_no as carrierNo, track_no as trackNo, category, channel, from_address_line1 as fromAddressLine1, from_address_line2 as fromAddressLine2, from_address_line3 as fromAddressLine3, from_zipcode as fromZipCode, from_whom as fromName, from_contact as fromContact, to_address_line1 as toAddressLine1, to_address_line2 as toAddressLine2, to_address_line3 as toAddressLine3, to_zipcode as toZipCode, to_whom as toName, to_contact as toContact, on_behalf as onBehalf, collect_num as collectNum from l_manual_order ord where ord.status = #{status} and ord.category = #{category} order by ord.update_on desc

select ord_no as orderNo, user_custom_order_no as userCustomOrderNo, status, create_by as creator, create_on as createOn, carrier_no as carrierNo, track_no as trackNo, category, channel, from_address_line1 as fromAddressLine1, from_address_line2 as fromAddressLine2, from_address_line3 as fromAddressLine3, from_zipcode as fromZipCode, from_whom as fromName, from_contact as fromContact, to_address_line1 as toAddressLine1, to_address_line2 as toAddressLine2, to_address_line3 as toAddressLine3, to_zipcode as toZipCode, to_whom as toName, to_contact as toContact, on_behalf as onBehalf, collect_num as collectNum from l_manual_order ord where ord.status = #{status} and ord.category = #{category} and ord.create_by = #{creator} order by ord.update_on desc

select content.ordno, content.dy_sku as dySku, content.name, content.num, content.price, content.picked, content.satisfied from l_manual_order_content content inner join l_manual_order ord on (content.ordno = ord.ord_no) where ordno = #{ordNo} and (ord.status = 2 or ord.status = 7) order by ord.update_on desc
select content.ordno, content.sku, content.dy_sku as dySku, content.name, content.num, content.price, content.picked, content.satisfied from l_manual_order_content content where ordno = #{ordNo}
mapper.update: update l_manual_order set abnormalReason=#{abnormalReason}, status=4 where ord_no = #{orderNo}
mapper.select: select count(1) from l_manual_order;
select * from l_manual_order where ord_no like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')
select * from l_manual_order order by create_on desc limit 1
select * from l_manual_order ord left join l_manual_order_content content on (ord.ord_no = content.ordno) where ord.create_by = #{creator}
select * from l_manual_order ord left join l_manual_order_content content on (ord.ord_no = content.ordno) where ord.ord_no like CONCAT('%', #{ordNo}, '%') limit 1
mapper.update: update l_manual_order set carrier_no=#{carrierNo}, track_no=#{trackNo}, update_on=now() where ord_no = #{ordNo}
mapper.insert:
insert into l_order_package(uuid, orderNo, length, width, height,totalWeight, carrierNo, trackNo) values
(#{item.uuid},#{item.orderNo},#{item.length},#{item.width},#{item.height},#{item.totalWeight},#{item.carrierNo},#{item.trackNo})
mapper.select: select uuid, orderNo, length, width, height, totalWeight, carrierNo, trackNo from l_order_package where orderNo = #{orderno}
